isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM DRIVE AXLES: EATON - INSTALL - FORWARD AXLE HOUSING COVER

svcproc.title: FORWARD AXLE HOUSING COVER
svcproc.para: If removed, install cover and fasten with nuts, bolts and lockwashers. Tighten to proper torque specifications .

note.para: Use silicone rubber gasket compound on axle housing mating surface as shown in Figure 15. Completely remove all old gasket material prior to applying new material. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the recommended gasket compound. Install carrier and axle housing cover before compound sets or reapply.

figure.caption: Figure 15. Lubrication of Forward Axle Housing Cover

step1.para: Apply silicone gasket compound. Install differential carrier assembly in the axle housing. Install nuts and lockwashers. Install bolts and tighten to correct torque.
Install output yoke and output shaft shoulder nut. Refer to the TORQUE CHART ..
Install axle shafts and axle stud nuts. (If used, also install lockwashers and taper dowels.)
Connect inter-axle driveline. Ensure driveline is properly phased. Lubricate U-joints.
Add axle lubricant. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubricants. Fill to bottom of filler hole; add two pints to power divider unit.

important.para: When axle has been disassembled or housing, axle shafts or wheel equipment replaced, check axle assembly for proper differential actions before operating vehicle. Wheels must rotate freely and independently.

step1.para: Road test vehicle to bring axle lubricant up to temperature. Re-check joints and drain and fill plugs for leakage. Re-tighten as necessary.
